songs.lyrics:
Gunjirahanchhan kaan ma baba ko antim bachan
Uhaako tan man sabai rastra ma samarpan
Kati runchha yo man ke runthyo gagan
Ek sahid ko laas maa deshdrohi ko kafan
Mero bidwaa aama ko ujhaad siudo ko kasam
Ma gardinchhu khatam yi sabailai ek saath
Jitna sakne chhaina sansar le vayera ek haat
Balchhu harek raat buba ko badla ko aago maa
Saitaan ko baas dekhchhu maanis ko haaso maa
Kaayar ko baahulya chha bir haruko maato maa
Naaija mero baato maa ma tero kaal ho
Ta jo sukai vaye pani malai baal ho
Dayaa maaya sabai maatra ek khayaal ho
Matlabi ko janjaal ho haamro samaaj yo
Ragat pasina garchhu ma khaadina haraam ko
Jalaidinchhu sabai hangaa ma yo sarkaar ko
Yo sarkaar lai euta challenge ho
Yeha ko sabai system niyam kanun lai euta challenge ho
Har ghuskhori netaa lai euta challenge ho
Its a challenge yeah its a challenge
Yo sarkaar lai euta challenge ho
Yeha ko sabai system niyam kanun lai euta challenge ho
Har ghuskhori netaa lai euta challenge ho
Its a challenge yeah its a challenge
Ma swoyam kaal lai pani daraudina
Dukha ma aatinna ma sukha maa ramaudina
Jabasamma kapur jati khalto ma khasaudina
Ma mero baba ko astu bagaudina
Husyaa le haat mage ma laat dinchhu
Baru ma kaala goraa bidesi lai saath dinchhu
Dher bolne mukh haruko daat vachdinchhu
Gurkha ko saakhi marchhu ki mardinchhu
Ki ghati katdinchhu ki jiudai gaddinchhu
Sabai rastriya sampatti chorera baru baddinchhu
Narkama jagdinchhu ek ek lai
Hasdai rokdinchhu barud ko vegg lai
Koi chaidaina ma ladnechhu eklai
Chattan ko chhati mero saahas chha beglai
Eklai ma sabai jana ko baraabar chhu
Ra ma dev devi daiti baraabar huu
Yo sarkaar lai eutaa challenge ho
Yeha ko sabai system niyam kanun lai eutaa challenge ho
Har ghuskhori netaa lai eutaa challenge ho
Its a challenge yeah its a challenge
Yo sarkaar lai eutaa challenge ho
Yeha ko sabai system niyam kanun lai eutaa challenge ho
Har ghuskhori netaa lai eutaa challenge ho
Its a challenge
Yeah its a challenge
songs.title: Challenge
